skills.title: General Computing
list: Performed development on Windows machines from Windows 3.1 to Windows 10, working on a machine of nearly every version in between
Worked on Linux machines from Mandrake in 1998 to Ubuntu 17.04, while also using Red Hat, FreeBSD, Mint, and core Debian distributions
Worked with Mac OSX most recently, performing all current development on Yosemite
Utilized virtual machines and other container solutions such as Docker

skills.title: Software Development
list: Scripting Languages: Batch (Windows), Bash (Linux), Python, Ruby
Programming Languages: C++, Python, FORTRAN, C, VB.Net, VBA, Modelica
Implemented language interop on multiple projects to pass control through multiple languages, using both native library calls with data marshaling, and also Swig
Software version control tools, including Git, Starteam, Subversion, and Bazaar

skills.title: Other Software
list: Publication tools, including LaTeX and GnuPlot
Office suites, including LibreOffice and MS Office, Gnumeric
Numeric tools, including EES, Matlab (Octave), MathCad, R, and Fluent
Design Tools, including AutoCAD and LibreCAD
Web Development in Python using Django
